Articles.Content: Throughout KSP 2 development we have seen slight variations in Kerbals, one of these variations being facial hair. I was wondering if we could get some insight on how exactly this will work, will it be determined randomly? Or will we the player choose what our Kerbals will look like?
I think it’ll be determined randomly, with no option to make it manual. Maybe in the cheat menu, if they keep the ability to create custom kerbals, there’ll be the ability to affect appearance.
